refnamediv.refpurpose: Finds the k nearest neighbours of the query point q, in the dataset f

listitem.para: a row vector containing the query point
f is the set of data points and the number of columns in f should be same as that of q to match point dimensionality
a positive integer specifying the number of nearest neighbours in f for the query point p.
a integer between 1 and 4 (both inclusive) specifying the algorithm to be used for the knn search.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: out = knn(q,f,k) return a 2xk matrix . The first row of out contains the indices of the k nearest points in the dataset(f) from the query point. The second row contains the corresponding distances(squared euclidean distance).
